author: slava77
body:
Updates to vertex sorting score assignment for somewhat special cases.
The fixes are a follow up to the bug reported in https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/recoDevelopment/1415.html
see #12969 for more details
title: fix to PV sorting when all track momenta are not well measured (B=0T case mainly) (same as #12969 )
